name: LD 38 THE HUNT
description:
The hunt is (or at least was supposed to be) a game about managing resources in a small spaceship environment. You have to hunt strange snake like creatures to harvest their energy, and that energy is scarce.

It was supposed to tie into the theme through the fact that the world is small and therefore the resources within are limited! Needless to say, as for many, I didn't get to do everything I want! ^^'

Thanks for playing!

PS: after the splash screen, the black loading screen may take time before the intro. Couldn't solve that problem. (It seems that playing it in admin mode fixes it?)
